Package com.stuypulse.stuylib.math

Class SLMath

java.lang.Object
com.stuypulse.stuylib.math.SLMath
public final class SLMath
extends java.lang.Object
SLMath (StuyLib Math) is a class containing many algorithms that are useful for developing robot code. Algorithms include limit, deadband, raising to powers while keeping the sign, and some other new algorithms we came up with.

  • Constructor Summary

    • deadband

      public static double deadband​(double x, double window)
      Dead bands x value with window being the dead band. all values for this are [-1.0...1.0]
      Parameters:
      x - value
      window - deadband window
      Returns:
      deadbanded value

      public static double spow​(double x, double power)
      spow (signless pow), raises a number to a power without affecting the sign of the number
      Parameters:
      x - input
      power - power to raise x to
      Returns:
      input ^ power

    • circular

      public static double circular​(double x, double p)
      Use the shape of a circle with power p to scale the input
      Parameters:
      x - input
      p - power (p greater than 1)
      Returns:
      circular return

      Returns:

    • fpow

      public static double fpow​(double base, int exp)
      fpow (fast pow), is a pow function that takes in an integer for the exponent. This allows it to be much faster on repeated calls due to the fact that it does not need to deal with fractional exponents.
      Parameters:
      base - base of the power
      exp - integer exponent of power
      Returns:
      result of calculation

    • round

      public static double round​(double n, int sigfigs)
      Round a double by a certain amount of sigfigs in base 10
      Parameters:
      n - number to round
      sigfigs - amount of sigfigs to round it to
      Returns:
      rounded number
